posts.post_content: It is my birthday, and I got outbid on the big ticket items in some recent auctions.  After giving a substantial donation to the red cross, I'm looking to get myself a birthday gift.  I'd be interested in T205 HOFers in psa 4-5, a T227 Baker or Bender psa 2-3, a nice T206 Jennings (portrait or two hands) or Clarke (batting), a T3 Clarke or Bender psa 3-4, or a T206 Cobb (any) at a 3-4 (and reasonably priced).  I'd be happy to take a similar SGC grade on any of the above.  Would also be interested in any autographed pre-war.  Email me at [url]joshmargolin@gmail.com[/url] with what you have for sale and your asking price.  If you want me to make the first offer on your card(s), you can save us both the email.  Thanks all, and I hope you all get out and vote today.

happy birthday!!
sounds like you'll be getting one hell of a gift :)
C'mon folks.  I want to do something today and so far only have 1 bite . . . throw me a bone here!
Thanks for the birthday wishes.  Still looking for that special something . . .

Maybe you would like to make an offer for all of my cards that are listed on ebay.  Not quite a mid grade Cobb but it would be a nice grab bag of items.

  [url]http://stores.ebay.com/Beckley-Card-Shop/Graded-Cards-/_i.html?_fsub=469992619&_sid=671285459&_trksid=p4634.c0.m322[/url]
[url]http://stores.ebay.com/Beckley-Card-Shop/Non-Graded-Cards-/_i.html?_fsub=469992719&_sid=671285459&_trksid=p4634.c0.m322[/url]
Thanks Eugene.  But none of those are really up my alley.  Best of luck.
